Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your endeavors. This unique offering holds immense value for me, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $850000. I trust this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns on your expenditure. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this exceptional product into your world. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $850,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $850,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
